puzzle.title: Condiments
puzzle.hint: The condiments on the plate are trying to tell you something.
The message in the condiments spells "connect seeds"
If you look closely, each type of seed is associated with a letter on the plate. They share the same order.
puzzle.solution: The condiments on the plate are letter-shaped. They spell out CONNECT SEEDS. Some of the letters on the plate have a small symbol next to or on them. The corresponding symbols on the bun, when connected (like a connect-the-dots), spell out CASSIDYS.
